mapper.select: SELECT area_id, area_name, srch_word, disp_order, disp_name FROM TB_AREA WHERE area_id = #{areaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_AREA ( area_id, area_name, srch_word, disp_order, disp_name )
VALUES ( area_id = #{areaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_name = #{areaName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, srch_word = #{srchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disp_order = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=INTEGER}, disp_name = #{dispName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_AREA
area_id = #{areaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_name = #{areaName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
srch_word = #{srchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disp_order = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=INTEGER},
disp_name = #{dispName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE area_id = #{areaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
